description: Updates information and words for a custom voice model.

parameters.name: customization_id
parameters.description: The GUID of the custom voice model that is to be updated. You must make the request with service credentials created for the instance of the service that owns the custom model.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A new name for the custom voice model.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A new description for the custom voice model.

parameters.name: words
parameters.description: An array of words and their translations that are to be added or updated for the custom voice model. Pass an empty array to make no additions or updates.
